tasks.label: Git Pump
tasks.command: $date = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'; $msg = 'automated update: ' + $date; Write-Host 'üöÄ Starting Git Pump...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; git add .; $status = git status --porcelain; if (-not $status) { Write-Host '‚ö†Ô∏è Nothing to commit.' -ForegroundColor Yellow; exit 0 } else { git commit -m $msg; Write-Host '‚¨ÜÔ∏è Pushing...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; git push; if ($?) { Write-Host '‚úÖ SUCCESS' -ForegroundColor Green; [Console]::Beep(880, 300) } }
